character.name: Andromeda
character.description:
<c=0009AB>ANDROMEDA</c> 
Stars Given Life. <c=keyword>Shifts the position of ships</c> through gravitational pull of nearby stars whenever cards are played.

PassiveGravitate.name: Gentle Gravity
PassiveGravitate.desc: After a card is played, move this ship by 1 space to the right, then decrease this by 1.

ForcefullGravitate.name: Forceful Gravity
ForcefullGravitate.desc: After you attack, regardless if you miss or not, move this ship by 1 space to the right, then decrease this by 1.

HermesDash.name: Hermes Dash
HermesDash.desc: Next time a ship with this status <c=action>Moves</c>, it moves again immediately by <c=keyword>{0}</c> spaces in the same direction.

desc.None: Launch an <c=midrow>asteroid</c> out of your every ship part.
desc.A: Launch an <c=midrow>asteroid</c> out of your every ship part.
desc.B: Launch a <c=midrow>bubbled asteroid</c> out of your every ship part.

desc.None: Bring all cards with <c=status>GRAVITY</c> from the <c=keyword>draw pile</c> to your <c=keyword>hand</c>.
desc.A: Bring all cards with <c=status>GRAVITY</c> from the <c=keyword>draw pile</c> to your <c=keyword>hand</c>.
desc.B: Bring all cards with <c=status>GRAVITY</c> from the <c=keyword>discard</c> to your <c=keyword>hand</c>.

desc.None: Move the enemy towards you, they take 1 damage for each space moved. {0}
desc.A: Move the enemy towards you, they take 1 damage for each space moved. {0}
desc.B: Move the enemy towards you, they take 1 damage for each space moved. {0}

description.None: Add 1 of 2 <c=cardtrait>discount, temp</c> <c=369BFF>Andromeda</c> cards to your hand.
description.A: Add 1 of 2 <c=cardtrait>discount, temp</c> <c=369BFF>Andromeda</c> cards to your hand.
description.B: Add 1 of 3 <c=cardtrait>discount, temp</c> <c=369BFF>Andromeda</c> cards to your hand.

ReversedPolarity.name: REVERSED POLARITY
ReversedPolarity.description: At the start of combat: add <c=card>Polarity</c> to your hand.

PocketTelescope.name: POCKET TELESCOPE
PocketTelescope.description: At the end of the turn: If ships do not overlap eachother, gain 1 <c=status>EVADE</c>.

Spaghettification.name: SPAGHETTIFICATION
Spaghettification.description: At the end of the turn: If you didn't attack at all, apply 1 <c=status>FORCEFUL GRAVITY</c> to the enemy.

ShatteredStar.name: SHATTERED STAR
ShatteredStar.description: At the start of every 2nd turn: The enemy gains 1 <c=status>GENTLE GRAVITY</c>. <c=status>GENTLE GRAVITY</c> moves things 2 spaces instead of 1. <c=downside><c=status>GENTLE GRAVITY</c> can no longer be triggered by <c=0009AB>Andromeda</c> and her cards.</c>
